website_summaries.verdict: Durable option with just the right amount of bling that will also make you look like a great gift-giver.
pros: On-trend chunky style with lots of bells and whistles, like luminous numerals, 3 dials for day, date, and stopwatch
cons: Links have to be removed by a jeweler for correct fit
Can feel big on a small wrist

customer_reviews.title: The Fossil you'd expect!
customer_reviews.text: It's a stunning watch. Large bezel with 3 chronographs. Has a nice weight like a real watch should. The movement is exceptionally well made just as you'd expect from a Fossil. As usual it came in a classic Fossil tin. I did need to order an extra link because I like it to move on my wrist, but it's perfect! (Which can be ordered directly from Fossil. First 3 are free, just pay S&H)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Michelle Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Love LOVE This Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! It took me a few days to get used to the size because it's almost as big as a man's watch. But, now I'm loving it and I don't have to squint to see the time! I've gotten tons of compliments and it truly goes with any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Anne & Saeed Richardson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this watch! Love the color, the size, the fit! It is easily my favorite watch! And I love that I can wear it dressed up and dressed down!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Osman

customer_reviews.title: I love it and I hope it lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Edit** I still have the watch and is in perfect condition, I plan to order the silver one. (2019) I got this watch and I have been using it one a week for over 3 months. The rinestones have not fallen down and the color has not faded. I really like it it is very elegant and not too big, not too small. So far so good and I take a good care of it. I would have love it for it to come in a different box, more elegant of something but it's ok. Update!: It's been a bit over 6 months and the color has faded a lil bit, like it's peeling. :( but the rihnestonea are good
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Merino

customer_reviews.title: If you need reading glasses....
customer_reviews.text: If you need reading glasses I wouldn’t expect to read the small numbers (which I didn’t think about when I purchased this), but I can read the main dial. Otherwise... this watch is solid and beautiful. I am 5’10” so most watches look puny on me. I wanted something with a bigger dial that wouldn’t look too masculine. The rhinestones around the edge are a feminine touch that makes it clear it’s mine, not one I borrowed from my husband. I have showered and swum with it and have had no issues. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: OkinawaMeow

customer_reviews.title: Rugged yet Femme
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight to watch , I love the reliability of Fossil . Looks feminine with all the crystals set in face and bezel.
customer_reviews.author: K9Life

customer_reviews.title: Hardly pink. Huge and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very heavy, not very pink at all, it is more copper tone than anything. Between each link of the band looks tarnished like it wasn't completely finished. This is a HUGE watch and looks like it should be a mens watch, not one for women. I am so disappointed my husband bought it for me for a birthday gift and I wanted so much to like it, but I just don't and I am very sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality...
customer_reviews.text: High quality 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩 My first purchase was an authentic gold but on my second purchase the color was slightly different, was more greenish gold but beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Love the look. The only problem I have noticed is one of the stones is missing now. Not too badly noticeable, but I know it is missing. Seller insists that the watch be packed and returned for replacement stone. So not worth it! I will just wear it till I get another watch. Much better results with the one prior to this I purchased. Not great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when making purchase and definitely read more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product on the right that is circled or so I thought but the package in the picture on the left is what I received totally not what I selectet or paid for. 2 completely different watches I don’t understand how a mistake like this can happen except that maybe it was the Christmas rush and it was an oversight on the sellers end. How can someone mistake rose gold for sterling silver or stainless steel. Buyers Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Pannell

customer_reviews.title: i'm in bling heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch. from the reviews I had read, I knew I would love it, but WOW......gorgeous! the one thing I was concerned about was the size from several people saying it was tight, and needed extra links.... I was afraid it was going to be too small..........quite the opposite, because I had to have a link taken out, and I'm medium build. it is an awesome watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie from texas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and I love the sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so beautiful! I originally bought 2 fossil watches with the intent of giving one to my daughter in law. I asked my son which one he thought she'd like better. Deep down inside I was hoping he wouldn't choose this one because I loved it so much that I wanted to keep it. Well, he chose this one. After about a week later, I decided to buy myself one. I just love the colors. Oh, and she did too!!!! Very classy looking watch. But I love fossil watches!
customer_reviews.author: K. Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my watch. I got it on time, great packaging, looks just like in the picture. I have been wearing it for a while now. I have dropped it several times (and my heart sinks each time) , but not even a little scratch. I have small wrist so I had the handle shortened, no big deal, and it doesn't look bulky or anything. I will definitely buy more of this brand
customer_reviews.author: MiaNewbie

customer_reviews.title: Watch band is not flexible
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous, but it doesn't bend around my wrist. It is stiff and hard. It makes it uncomfortable to wear. I thought it would conform to the wrist. The face is also raised. Unfortunately, I have another Fossil watch that has a raised face and within a few weeks I had lost "diamonds" out of the watch because I would bump the watch on surfaces. I never wear it because it looks weird with the "diamonds" missing. I don't want chance it again. I am returning the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lovinmythree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & quality watch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this watch 24/7 exclusively since October 2019 when I purchased it. Awesome quality watch for price!!! I’m a nurse and I wash my hands several times in a shift and water proof is important to me. This watch withstands showers, hand washing, etc. Thank you Amazon for the awesome price point!
customer_reviews.author: Sam&Hannah’smom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch looks fantastic! My only complaint is that the smaller dials inside the watch are sketchy. They I can only get the date of the month to work. The bottom dial and the day of the week I couldn’t figure out how to change. May just be me, but the instruction booklet was difficult to figure out too as it’s saort of just a general one with sort of halfway universal instructions that don’t becessarily apply to every fossil watch model. I will look on the fossil website for better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: AmyVsings

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch.! I have had so many compliments on it. I wear it daily. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Accurate Watch
customer_reviews.text: Attractive watch and I like the blend of gold and silver, so it goes with everything. Easy enough to take it to a jeweler and have a few links removed as it's large (typical size for new watch). Seems to keep time accurately so far. Very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: LaurieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch !
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend absolutely loves this !!! Its very durable, and well made, AND 330 ft water resistant, plus it has the larger face which makes it easier to read, with 3 subdials, that tells the day of the week, the days date, and military time. The crystals in the bezel are awesome also, when the light reflects from those, it has reflections of all different colors, which usually means their authentic, not like glass, or plastic. If you want a nice watch, i highly recommend this one, AND its a fossil.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch. It arrived early and looked just like the picture. I've had it for 3 months now and it still looks and works great. I can wear this watch dressed up or down....great all around watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tnk

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best watches I’ve ever owned. This is the 2nd Fossil Riley I have bought. My previous one I had about 8 years I wore it every single day. I worked in it. I swam in it. Changed the battery maybe 3 times which wasn’t expensive at all. Dress it up or down. Lots of compliments. Just recently a crystal fell off one of the inside numbers and I thought it time to get a new one at this price. The first one I bought was $150. I paid $47 this time. Great price for a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Vick

customer_reviews.title: The color of it is terrible. Not like it's shown
customer_reviews.text: The color of it is terrible. Not like it's shown. I almost feel as though I got a fake watch.
customer_reviews.author: Reeci Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fossil watch. It is lovely. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. I love everything about the design. It's easy to read and change the time. The hands are luminescent. It's fairly waterproof. Bigger than I'm used to but it definitely worked. Great purchase. Feels sturdy. Clasp is easy to lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Kellsie

customer_reviews.title: I love Fossil
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this beautiful watch. I am very happy with my gift. I have always trusted Fossil for great quality & to last for years. But we've always purchased all our watches from the actual Fossil store, this will be the first time we're using Amazon so I'm hoping it doesn't turn because I am known to shower with my watch on or wash dishes. But as of now I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: M.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I don't know if it's water resistant or not but I don't ever take my watches under water or let any type of water get on them. This is a simple style with a little bit of shine and it's so classy. It goes with every outfit. I like my watches to fit a little bit loose and this one is perfect. The face of the watch is a little bit bigger and it's just the perfect size to catch someone's eye. I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Saralyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch a couple months ago and have worn it daily since. It's a perfectly sized watch that goes woth every single outfit and it looks very nice and sparkles as well. It is a Fossil watch so the quality name is there and there is a reason they are a good brand. Highly recommend this watch and I'm sure I will get a good long life out of my beautiful watch. So very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great for small wrists wanting to try the oversize watch trend!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try the oversize watch trend, but wasn't sure what size to go with for a six inch wrist. This is perfect! The two-tone is beautiful and will go with any outfit. The watch is a bit loose and will slide up and down my wrist a bit when I walk/gesture, but I like the look. I may take a link or two out if it becomes bothersome, but so far I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: ogs901

customer_reviews.title: Watch seems like it may have been returned and then sent to me.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fossil fan! However I recieved this watch and it seems as if it's a return. The plastic protector that is typically on the entire band was just on one half of the band. The price tag was taken off at the profroated area. The carton inside the box is broken and the tin is also damaged. This should not have been delivered this way. I'm a bit disappointed. I absolutely love Fossil watches though.
customer_reviews.author: Tika

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look original!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t look authentic, looks cheap and very light weight. I don’t think so that it’s original fossil plus it’s doesn’t look like it’s shows in picture. I did not like it at all and returned it right away. I have many original fossil watches and I can tell just by looking at these watch that it’s not original. I would not recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Truly stainless and rose gold!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I wasn't sure if the rose gold would be more yellow, but it's very "rosey" and pretty. It's a larger watch but has a nice button on the strap making it easy to take on and off. Seems durable (i've only had it a month or so now). All of the rhinestones/crystals around the face are nicely set and sparkle. I looked at several (many!) watches and am so happy I found and settled on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic
customer_reviews.text: It’s gigantic! It looks like an NBA player should be wearing it. I looked at many ladies Fossil watches before I bought this one and I assumed that this one would be comparable. I was wrong! I am going to try and get links taken out of it so that it may fit my wrist. So far, I haven’t had any luck finding a jeweler that can help me. If you want the oversized look, this would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fossil watch
customer_reviews.text: I had to recently replace my former fossil watch of over five years. Toddler through it on tile floor and broke the band and something inside to where it didn’t work properly. This was the closest/similar model they had to my last one. Love it but I’m not sure what all the dials are for on the watch except days of the week. No instructions came with. I need to make the watch band 1 or2 links smaller Not sure it’ll get done anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a wrist of 8” forget this watch. It looks cheap in person! Buyer beware! The somehow fake Armitron I bought here at Amazon that’s mysteriously not in English actually has better quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gold is much more muted than in the pic...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 4.5 stars because the gold isn't nearly as bright as it appears in the product photo (it's a faint gold tone). I had to round down because, for me, that the gold tone was as bright as the silver tone mattered. Size is substantial, which I personally love, but still feminine (more effeminate in a hot fitness model way rather than a sweet librarian way, though - lol).
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Watch with Bling
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch!!! Has the right amount of bling without being over the top. I get lots of compliments on my new watch. Not too heavy around my wrist. I just wish the band was slightly larger around the wrist. The price for the watch was very reasonable at $50.00. My watch came super fast in less than 2 days in the mail. They even sent me a photo shot to say package was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this watch are beautiful, but the watch itself is larger than I expected. However, I did keep it. What was nice is that the watch was already set correctly for my time zone when it arrived. The only downside is that I have to go online to get the instructions to reset it in the future. Instructions did not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: Not cute
customer_reviews.text: Very ugly. Big, bulky and the color on the watch is faded looking. Not vibrant at all. I prefer the multicolored one (good &silver). I returned it the same day it was delivered. I’m sticking with Anne Klein watches.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Can't read the time
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful watch, HOWEVER how are you supposed to tell time with black numbers on a black face watch? Sadly disappointed as a I had a watch similar to this one years ago. But the numbers were highlighted with a diamond so you could easily see what time it is. Not so much with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: inproper packaging
customer_reviews.text: the watch arrived loose in a amazon box was rattling around in box the tin metal box that is where the watch should have been there was also a lid to protect the watch. also did arrive to late for a gift. although the watch is very nice
customer_reviews.author: American Express

customer_reviews.title: So Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled about this purchase. The color is just as pictured, it's easy to read, and feels great. It has a heavy weight to it, but not too heavy. It fits just perfect, no slack or moving. I've worn it only once so far, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Epps

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in the shipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my new watch and upon arrival it was packaged with 2 other ordered items- which was in a large box! The metal tin Fossil watches come in was dented and opened, the watch was rolling around out in the box loose!!! The band was extremely small, as if someone had removed links from it, and it was running.(nothing to keep the watch stem from being pushed in) I went online to see how to set it....filled directions- it would not keep time at all!! I was so disappointed!!! I loved the look of this watch and would have liked to kept it had it worked!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ilovebooks

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love the beauty of this watch. The size and weight are perfect. Easy to read time. A little more difficult to read day and date! (Probably because I can't see!) Have not and will not test it in water! Want to preserve this beauty for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for about a week. It's exactly what I wanted. It's big face is easy to read, I think it's classy, stylish & can be worn dressed up or down. I can't speak about the water resistance as I haven't 'submerged' the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Form Should Follow Function
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a good looking watch, unless you're actually looking at it to tell time. The material used for the watch hands is nearly identical in color to the material used on the face of the watch, thereby making it difficult to actually tell time at a glance, and especially in certain lighting or with any reflection on the glass of the watch. I prefer a watch with a contrast between the hands and the face, so as to actually see the time. It's also somewhat heavy and cumbersome in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: This watch looks amazing, it is much more fashionable when I got ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks amazing, it is much more fashionable when I got it....It does not look like a watch to wear everyday...too elegant.. it's big- which I like but the fastener looks a bit masculine.
customer_reviews.author: tedz

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Its Fossil. Everyone I have ever had has been a good, quality, long lasting watch. My only complaints are the box was open when it arrived and it did not have a pin in it. Who knows how long its been running. Other than that, its pretty! It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, packaged well and watch was as described only more beautiful! It has a big face but I love it. It is on the heavy side but the beauty and quality over ride that for me. I You Tubed how to remove links from a Fossil watch - this one in particular and had it fitting my wrist within several minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful but difficult to read.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bling bevel and the color. The watch overall seems to be very good quality and well made, however, it is larger than I anticipated and fairly heavy, almost like a mans watch. I like it and wear it yet deal with the heaviness. My main disappointment is that it is difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It's beautiful and practical because it's silver and has gold too! It's also great value for the money. It's slightly big on my wrist because my wrist is small. I would give this watch as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: LPD

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas, and I absolutely love it. It is really a nice piece. The over sized face is just the right size. Fossil in my opinion is one of the best watches you can get for under $100.00.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin R Batten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a nice women's watch for a while now that looks dressier than what I currently own. This one fits the bill perfectly. The stones around the bezel make it look classy. I have several Fossil watches and they never disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Looks classy :)
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful!! I love the weight, feel, and look of this watch. I read some reviews about the band being discolored, but I didn't notice anything. If I begin to see some, I'll update the review, but so far I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: K Fiery

customer_reviews.title: Was not what i expected...bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a bithday gift for my wife...i was very disappointed it look totally different from what was advertised... As a black watch its very difficult to see the time without looking at it very carefully...the numbers an hangs are not highlighted unlike the photo which is shown...i regret buying dis item...have to try an purchase another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my watch today and it’s absolutely beautiful! I love the look size and bling! It has just enough sparkle to dress up an outfit without looking gaudy. I would definitely recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sparkle. The date multifunction is a bit difficult to read and I don't think there's much use for the international time multifunction. But overall I love this item. Definitely would repurchase especially at the price!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: 3 windows are too tiny to read.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. It’s pretty. It’s heavy. My only issue is that I can not read the 3 little windows that tell the date and stuff. I wear glasses and still can’t read them. I decided to give my watch away and buy something I can read.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Glenn

customer_reviews.title: So far k absolutely love it. just got today
customer_reviews.text: So far k absolutely love it .just got today.so beautiful. Got many people saying how beautiful it is already.i hope I feel the same in the future and don't have any problems but fossil brand is awesome an amazon is amazing. Very fast shipping. Thank you just in time for my birthday. Had to get two links taken out.fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn owens

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as rose gold as I’d like but I think the idea of what rose gold looks like is very different across brands. It’s a very nice looking watch and I’m glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful and a great deal. I get lots of compliments on it. It fit really well and I have a small wrist. Was surprised I didn't have to have any links taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured at all, thought the gold was more prominent, in fact this is why I bought it but you can barely see the gold on it... Disappointing😕
customer_reviews.author: claudy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Fossil has always produced top notch watches. This one is no different. I love the look of it. It was easy to set up. And dresses up or dresses down. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Very classy looking. Can be worn casually or for a dressier occasion. Love the two tone metal color of it. This allows you to wear whatever jewelry you want with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and looks very fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels expensive. The bracelet is too big so I haven't worn it yet, but looks incredible and can't wait to put it on! Just the right size and amount of diamonds around it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and wears it every day to work. It is a classy watch for those who don't need to have everything connected. It tells the time and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Tittle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch! Very pretty. I have had my watch for a year now. I wear it almost every day and it still looks great. Band has stretch but then it's leather so it will. I rub saddle soap into the band to keep it looking good. I get lots of compliments on it all the time
customer_reviews.author: wzul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my mom for Christmas and she loved it so much!!! It’s an absolutely beautiful watch and the perfect size! I hope she enjoys this for years to come :)
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl🏔

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, Beautiful and So Rich Looking!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this watch today!! OMG, it is STUNNING, BEAUTIFUL AND VERY RICH LOOKING!!! You will not go wrong buying this Stunning watch!!! Ladies, don't walk, run!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! Easy to read dial. Love the two tone strap. There is nothing that I do not like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: She Loves Her New Watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the look of the watch. We did have to pay a jeweler to remove a couple links from the band. All in all, the better half is happy, so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Like the watch. Great quality. I thought it was a little more gold. But lovely watch.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: I get lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a nice blingy watch for some time. I didn't want to spend over $100 and found this beauty for around $60.00. This watch is beautiful. It is large which I wanted. I get lots of compliments on it. It was packaged very nice with lots of protection.Shipment was lightning fast. So glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: too heavy for  a watch
customer_reviews.text: Way to big for my wrist. I have a thin wrist and this is way too big, and heavy..not worth keeping. If you have a small wrist, just be prepared having this watch is like having a workout. prob weighs over 1lb.
customer_reviews.author: O. Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great quality Watch, Color is more like a Copper tone not like the Rose Gold in the images. Besides that is OK Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice but when looking closer it’s has many defects. Paint is chipping on the links and the Inner face of the watch has some obvious scratches. To top it off it fit right. So sad because I’ve had my eye on this for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful & Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: A watch worth getting! They even set the time & day on my watch! Great Customer Service! The silver & gold make it easy to accessorize with either your silver or gold jewelry! Fossil was so much better in have a 11 year warranty verses other brands having 3 or less! It shows that Fossil is longer lasting than most brands & if there are any problems they are willing to fix any issue with your watch. Highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Alaura Larrett

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this watch, the fit, color, size perfect. I bought rose gold. It goes very well with all outfits. Watch is little big on my wrist but I ll fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not functional
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a stunning piece of jewelry, however, I bought it because I need to be able to use the second hand for work and since the watch face and numbers and hands are all black, it is not functional and you cannot tell time on this watch unless you have a ton of light shining on it. I can only wear it for looks, not to tell time
customer_reviews.author: Carol M Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful watch but I am disappointed because the watch is tight on my wrist..Amazon said they do not have links and contact fossil. When did I was told that because I am from internal I would not be able to receive the links..So stupid because I used that same credit card to purchase the watch on Amazon...very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday, go any where watch, at a fabulous price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! It’s my everyday watch, very comfortable, easy to read, goes with all my clothing colors and mixed colors of gold jewelry. Also good for the golf course or dog walking to see how much time is left before time to leave for the next activity!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love Fossil watches, I have a few I wear to work as a nurse, but I have plenty I wear for dressing up as well. Very durable, very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent watch
customer_reviews.text: So far it's working out good for me, I don't wear it on a every day basis so it's still looking very good, hoping that the colour doesn't change.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Fossil Women's ES2811 Riley Rose Gold-Tone wristwatch Wife loves the stylish large easy to read gold tone watch. Keeps accurate time.
customer_reviews.author: Knuckledraqger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This size & style Fossil watch is my favorite. I have several Fossil watches but this is my first & only gold tone watch & the gold shade is a soft & beautiful shade of gold.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Band Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful but It needed an additional link. Runs very small to be an adult watch. Getting a link is a lot of extras! You have to contact Fossil, order a link, order the kit, (becuz it’s not an easy fix for this watch), pay $15, and wait 3 weeks for delivery. Too much.......
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Simmons

customer_reviews.title: In love with this watch
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get over how beautiful this watch is. I was a little nervous about ordering it but when it arrived I was so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It came down to either this one or another semi similar that was a bit more basic. Decided on this one because of how much I liked it but I was needing a watch for everyday wear and I should've known better because I've already lost one of jewels. So now saving this for nights/weekends and just ordered the runner up for everyday wear :) Super excited to have both. Now just have to find somewhere to get the jewel replaced. Not sure if there was a warranty on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it is way to big and it's more bronse gold then pink. I'm looking for a smaller one but this will do until🤷‍♀️ I'll wear it here & there but I don't want such a big watch or maybe my wrist is just small.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: The beautiful look of a Fossil watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many watches in the past I even had a Rolex but I love my fossil stainless steel it’s beautiful I love the silver look in the face with the three dials and it’s just the ultimate watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The face is very dark it is hard to distinguish the hands and numbers
customer_reviews.text: Love fossil watches! However the dark face on this watch makes it nearly impossible to tell the time. It was a gift given so I am waiting to see if I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: sonja

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous watch. Too bad only the date dial works. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch. I can read it without my glasses. Had two links removed and it fits perfect. I bought another one different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Very nice but the box it came in is metal and was very bent up I guess during shipping I hope! The watch didn’t look damaged and I hope it didn’t effect it.The only reason I’m giving it a 3 star is because the package the watch itself is a 5 star! I would recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Too Large
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this watch would be so big when I ordered it. It was ridiculous on my fairly large wrist. I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for the price. Looks way more expensive than it really is. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Ms SuperMom

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long enough to comment on how well the finish stands up, which is why I bought it. Otherwise it is beautiful and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my GF, she really liked it or so i believe. Has nice weight to it but band could have been made better. For the price it's ok though.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love fossil watches. Good quality. Good prices. Beautiful. Just an overall good watch. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch to match my work outfits and it’s perfect. I love how elegant it looks. Not too heavy to wear. Very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and get compliments every time I wear it. It keeps great time and very classy
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN C DAVIS

product_meta.title: Fossil Women's Riley Stainless Steel Multifunction Glitz Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
With a classic shape and sporty features, Riley is a style that transcends the season. Our shimmering Riley watch adds sparkle to the season. Brilliant stainless steel and a dazzling crystal dial will ensure that you stand out. This Riley watch also features a multifunction movement on a stainless steel bracelet.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  [PDF 6.19 MB] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :3.94 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 4.11 Ounces
 * Item model number :ES3202
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :September 27, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Fossil
 * ASIN :B009BEO81I

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #11,976 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #6330 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #17 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars5,487 ratings With a classic shape and sporty features, Riley is a style that transcends the season. Our shimmering Riley watch adds sparkle to the season. Brilliant stainless steel and a dazzling crystal dial will ensure that you stand out. This Riley watch also features a multifunction movement on a stainless steel bracelet.
feature_bullets: Case size: 38mm; Band size: 18mm; quartz movement with luminous 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal face; imported. Care instructions - To keep it looking good over time, clean with a soft dry cloth
Round stainless steel case with crystal detail at bezel; silver satin dial with crystal hour markers
Stainless steel bracelet with deployment clasp closure
Multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality; three separate dials to track hours, minutes and seconds; timer; 24 hour
Water resistant to 330 feet (100 M): suitable for bathing, swimming or snorkeling, but is not resistant enough to withstand scuba diving
